name: Deputy directors; appointment
text: [§353C-3]  Deputy directors; appointment.  The director shall appoint, without regard to chapter 76, three deputy directors to serve at the director's pleasure.  Unless otherwise assigned by the director, one deputy director shall oversee the correctional programs and facilities of the department, one deputy director shall oversee the law enforcement programs of the department, and one deputy director shall oversee administration of the department. [L 1989, c 211, pt of §6; am L 2000, c 253, §150]
